author: Mark DiPasquale
text: In previous versions of a community's replacement schedule the person preparing the schedule has used a 2% inflation factor for projecting future replacement costs.  In our area the historical inflation factor for all goods is between 3% and 3.5%.  What is a common inflation factor for vehicle and equipment replacement?
title: Fleet Replacement Schedules
